full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

* **Title**: E60HN-16ELEC - Stream 1 - Explosion Proof Lighting
* **Reference Number**: cb-207-49655839
* **Solicitation Number**: W6897-24-0001
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-10T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29

### Procurement Category

* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Supply Arrangement

* **Supply Arrangement Reference**: E60HN-16ELEC
* **Open to Pre-Qualified Suppliers**: Only pre-qualified suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC can submit a bid.
* **Region of Opportunity**: Medicine Hat, Alberta, Canada

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit bids for the supply and delivery of explosion-proof lighting and related items to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield by March 29, 2024. The required items include:

* Eaton EVLEDC701 Explosion-Proof Light (6 units or equivalent)
* Eaton EVLLA11LC0-UNV1 Explosion-Proof Light (8 units or equivalent)
* Eaton EVSA Light Adaptor (8 units or equivalent)
* Eaton P71 Stainless Steel Light Guard (8 units or equivalent)
* Freight (as required)

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

This notice of proposed procurement is published in accordance with Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HN-16ELEC. Suppliers are requested to review the tender notice and consult the relevant documentation on the CanadaBuys website for additional information.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Tyfany Heslop
* **Contact Email**: [tyfany.heslop@forces.gc.ca](mailto:tyfany.heslop@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (403) 544-4017

### Important Documents

Please note that this tender opportunity has expired. The original tender notice, document list, and bidding instructions can be found on the CanadaBuys website.

Hope this helps! Good luck. Let me know if you need any further editing or marketplace
